data.name: Hold
data.description: Hold slip for items on hold or recall that are available for pickup
data.template:
{{staffSlip.Name}} slip

{{requester.lastName}}, {{requester.firstName}}

Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
